author: Fextralife
description:
The Blood of Dawnwalker Gameplay Impressions - BEST GAME at Gamescom
In this Fextralife video, I'm going to be talking a little bit about my first impressions with the Blood of Dawnwalker, which, if you haven't heard of it, is an action role-playing title that's being developed by Rebel Wolves, which is made up of ex-CDPR executives and staff, including the lead quest designer for The Witcher 3 and Cyberpunk 2077. This game is being published by Bandai Namco and is expected to come out sometime next year, with no known release date.
